metadata.title: CVE-2021-0941 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In bpf_skb_change_head of filter.c, there is a possible out of bounds readdue to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-154177719References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-0941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
